title: Justin Bieber kisses wife Hailey in romantic music video 10,000 Hours... days after lavish wedding
text:
He's teased new music throughout the week following his second wedding to model wife Hailey Baldwin.

And Justin Bieber released a new video to accompany the track 10,000 hours with country superstars Dan + Shay.

The 25-year-old crooner enlisted the help of his leading lady to star in the romantic new track where they are spotted making out among a bed of roses.

Kisses! Justin Bieber released a new video to accompany the track 10,000 hours with country superstars Dan + Shay

'I'd spend 10,000 hours and 10,000 more, oh, if that's what it takes to learn that sweet heart of yours,' the newlywed croons in the chorus.

Justin and Hailey are first featured together sitting in a stark room, with his beaming bride positioned on a chair wearing a strappy white crop top and jeans.

The Sorry hitmaker wore an unbuttoned House of Drew shirt and khaki's while leaning over a bed to kiss his wife's hand.

Just the two of us: Justin and Hailey are first featured together sitting in a stark room, with his beaming bride positioned on a chair wearing a strappy white crop top and jeans

Casual: The Sorry hitmaker wore an unbuttoned House of Drew shirt and khaki's while resting on a plush white bed

Hailey was positively giddy in the video as her husband gave her a quick kiss.

The room magically transformed into a floral haven with thousands of beautiful blooms taking over the empty space.

She took flight as he propped her up on top of his legs for a quick airplane game amid the flowers.

In another scene, the couple cuddled up together in an empty warehouse with Hailey helping Justin reach the top of the harmonies.

Pretty as a petal: Hailey looked gorgeous in a plunging white top as she sprawled across the bed while holding a hot pink flower

Sweet: Hailey was positively giddy in the video as her husband gave her a quick kiss

Flower power: The room magically transformed into a floral haven with thousands of beautiful blooms taking over the empty space

Having fun: She took flight as he propped her up on top of his legs for a quick airplane game amid the flowers

'And I might never get there, but I'm gonna try. If it's 10,000 hours or the rest of my life, I'm gonna love you,' he continued in the song.

Home footage throughout the nearly three-minute long video showed Hailey and Justin kissing and hugging.

He had referred to the then-upcoming single as 'Wedding music,' while promoting it on Twitter Wednesday.

A blast: Home footage throughout the nearly three-minute long video showed Hailey and Justin kissing and hugging

To be loved: Hailey and Justin were all over each other in the music video

Husband and wife: Justin and Hailey were married once again in a black-tie affair on Monday in South Carolina

Bliss: The happy couple were the picture of happiness in black-and-white photobooth shots from their nuptials
